query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_campaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('follow_up', 'reminder', 're_engagement', 'welcome', 'interview_invitation', 'offer_notification', 'rejection') NOT NULL,
  trigger_condition VARCHAR(500),
  subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('active', 'paused', 'draft', 'archived') DEFAULT 'draft',
  send_delay_hours INT DEFAULT 0,
  target_status VARCHAR(100),
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type ENUM('follow_up', 'reminder', 're_engagement', 'welcome', 'interview_invitation', 'offer_notification', 'rejection') NOT NULL,

  send_delay_hours INT DEFAULT 0,

  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
